origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialAPI.get_loan_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves specific financial data related to loans, such as non-performing loans, based on the type of data, company name, and year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'dataType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of loan data, e.g., non_performing_loans, loan_to_deposit_ratio.'}, {'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the data is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'The requested financial data.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialAPI.get_loan_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'dataType'是'non_performing_loans', 'company'是'China CITIC Bank', 'year'是'2023'.
